author: smokeyjay
body:
I sold crwd and ddog to lock in profits.  Put in $2200 to nasdaq etf today.  Working so didnt want to make big moves.  

Might add to $adsk, twlo, dis

Interested in mtch, meli

author: Tacocats_wrath
body:
Draft king does not do it for me. They have a lot of cash on hand. I don't see much thats good about them other then that. Maybe in the future,but not today. 

Their last earning reported revenue of 212.82 M. Not bad, however they had a net income of -545M😳 and a net profit margin of -256%. 

If you want to buy a nasty dip I would be more inclined to buy PayPal, autodesk, unity software, mercadolibre, visa, teladoc.

author: smokeyjay
body:
I'll be happy if the SP drops 10-20%.  As of now, its being propped up by like 20 big cap stocks while the other 480 stocks have fallen at least 25% from their ATHs.

I'm less confident in some of my stock holdings now - still holding and I plan to add to $V, $twlo, $adsk, $tdg but acknowledging the bear case for each company begins to resonate more.  Also closed out on some of my Chinese positions today (lesson learnt) so thats realized losses for me.

author: Tacocats_wrath
body:
Well, I exaggerated a bit to play on the tittle of the post, but I have seen some brutal drawdown. My stocks lost about 33k in value in the past week and on top of that, I bought 15k worth of 270strike autodesk calls after the big dip. I thought it was foolproof. Then the new variant came out of nowhere and wrecked my calls. I have 2 weeks left in them and am down 75%. 

So yeah, loss is still accurate..ish. down over 40k in a week. I'm not sweating though. I am just averaging down on positions.

author: Minute-General8710
body: stocks should regain their value, depending on if the companies are shit or not....but autodesk, idk. good luck bro bro !

author: pedestrianhomocide
body:
I randomly typed in A, saw Autodesk pop up and was down 88% in the last month and threw a few $300 calls in a few days ago. 

Up 50% on my calls so far in 2 days.  I figure it's all random luck bullshit, so might as well just randomly throw options around as well.

Here's to being destitute in a few years.

author: Tacocats_wrath
body: Thanks mate. I think the stocks are good companies. Not meme's. But yeah, I have a feeling I will be saying good bye to my autodesk yolo. I will hold it though. God hates a coward.
